original_text: And he shall do with the bullock as he did with the bullock for a sin offering, so shall he do with this: and the priest shall make an atonement for them, and it shall be forgiven them.
korean_text: 그 송아지를 속죄제의 수송아지에게 한 것 같이 할지며 제사장이 그것으로 회중을 위하여 속죄한즉 그들이 사함을 받으리라

sentences.original_text: And he shall do with the bullock
as he did with the bullock for a sin offering,
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 속죄제를 위한 수소로 했던 것처럼,

sentences.original_text: so shall he do with this:
and the priest shall make an atonement for them,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 제사장은 그들을 위해 속죄할 것이며,

sentences.original_text: and it shall be forgiven them.
